department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班
department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering

goal.ch: 營建從業人員應需對工程會計具一定之認知與了解，以落實成本管控並符合現代高度整合專案工程之需求。本課程主要教導學生熟習會計之相關領域與原理，並佐以工程管理上之實例，幫助學生有效整合專案工程成本控制與施工管理。
goal.en: Construction professionals should possess a certain level of knowledge and understanding of construction accounting to effectively implement cost control and meet the demands of modern highly integrated project engineering. This course primarily instructs students in becoming proficient in relevant areas and principles of accounting, supplemented with practical examples in construction management, to assist students in effectively integrating project engineering cost control and construction management.
